get.description: Ping for API up validation. On valid returns {ping: pong}

post.description: uploads an image, document, audio, video or archive asset
creates a new shopping cart for the store declared in the request header

get.description: returns a cart from the database

post.description: adds multiple items at once to a cart
attaches a customer to the cart by email

put.description: updates a cart's status to: unknown = 0, new = 1, checkout = 2, paid = 3, complete = 4, abandoned = 5

get.description: returns a cart from the session object
returns all categories belonging to a store
returns all categories by slug belonging to a store
returns all categories by id belonging to a store

post.description: verifies the email address is unique

get.description: returns all products by sku belonging to a store
returns all products by category id belonging to a store
returns all products belonging to a store

is_default.description: indicates if this is a default address

total_price.description: the sum total of the cart

sort_order.description: sort order of menu items on the same level and same parent id

exists.description: boolean true/false if email exists or not

email.description: email address, unique to each store id

expires_at.description: when this item expires in the cart

email.description: email address, unique per store id

short_description.description: product short description. used in category pages

default_image.description: default Asset object of image type

images.description: array of Asset objects of image type

categories.description: array of Asset objects of image type

is_default.description: indicates if this is the default store
is default variant. each product must have exactly 1 default variant

sku.description: variant sku. usually the product sku with appended identification tags

weight.description: variant weight. used in calculating shipping

height.description: variant height. used in calculating shipping

width.description: variant width. used in calculating shipping

depth.description: variant depth. used in calculating shipping
